page.title: 08A TYPICAL DAY:ST.ALBANS
page.content: When we get to school we play football until the bell goes. We hang our coats up and go into the class-room.After prayers we sit down to read. Mrs. Everson took our group for maths today and we finished Book 3. After maths we have playtime. We play football. After play we had a spelling test until music.At music we sing and play the descant recorder. We are also learning to play the treble recorder. We both bring a packed lunch to school and we eat it in the dining hall with the children who have school lunches. After lunch it's play and then we go swimming at Marshalswick School. After the warm up we practise for the Junior Swimmers Award. Near the end of the lesson we have free-time. We get back to school and Mrs.Everson reads us a story until hometime. At home we play, eat and watch T.V until bedtime.
